item.title: settings.php: Sample settings.local.php
item.description: 1<?php 2$databases['default']['default'] = array ( 3'database' => 'yourDB', 4'username' => 'yourDBA', 5'password' => 'yourDBPASS', 6'prefix' => '', 7'host' => 'localhost', 8'port' => '3306', 9'namespace' => 'Drupal\\Core\\Database\\Driver\\mysql', 10'driver' => 'mysql', 11); EDIT: Updated to reflect new learning in https://ismael.casimpan.com/quicktasks-drupal/post/weird-session-issue/
